    Subclasses of QuotaSettings in org.apache.hadoop.hbase.quotas
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    GlobalQuotaSettings
    An object which captures all quotas types (throttle or space) for a subject (user, table, or namespace).
    class 
    GlobalQuotaSettingsImpl
    Implementation of GlobalQuotaSettings to hide the Protobuf messages we use internally.

    QuotaSettingsFactory.QuotaGlobalsSettingsBypass
     
    (package private) class 
    SpaceLimitSettings
    A QuotaSettings implementation for configuring filesystem-use quotas.
